info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: If you need to find a peaceful place to stay in Dhaka. I recommend this place. It’s located in a residential area which means less cars and car-horn sounds! The place is near local supermarket and easy to walk around. The host is helpful and friendly!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
A fantastic place, it is exacly as it says, very clean and secured. Despite being on the GF, it felt very safe. The location is good, very calm and quiet with a nice park to go for walks, (not something you can say about other parts/areas of dhaka).
You have access to a communal kitchen on a diff floor, along with Washing machine, but I didn't use those facilities, but they looked good.
Good internet, the cleaners were lovely and did a thorough job during my stay. There are stores within 5 mins walking on either direction to get all your grocery or takeaway food should you choose.
Internet is fast and reliable. Good host, good communication. The white noise is something that is true but its not frequent, none of the weekends, you are likely to hear generators in pretty much every home in dhaka. so I don't think its a massive issue given how lovely the place is. I don't watch tele, but my only suggestion should be to have a better quality tv, and a better desk chair. I am only saying this because I WFH for my entire stay, so it did get used a lot.
Overall, I do not think there's any other listing on airbnb that ticks so many boxes unless you are going for luxurious serviced apartments in dhaka.
Thankyou

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · October 2019
rating_comment:
Sabih's place is close to the airport in a safe neighborhood close to transport and shops.
I mostly walked everywhere or caught a rickshaw. The staff was super helpful and I really enjoyed my stay.
I highly recommend staying at Sabih's place if you are a solo traveler!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2019,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Very nice, stylish, clean flat with AC and hot water that work perfectly. Fantastic location. Safe, friendly neighborhood with a beautiful lake park where one can run, walk and exercise. The area is constantly guarded. Grocery store is nearby, and food delivery / ride-sharing services are available easily at one press of a button. I had a great stay and would be happy to come back and stay in this flat should I have to travel to Dhaka again. Very friendly and educated host and smiling gatekeepers. Highly recommended.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2019,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
I usually do not stay at Air BnB much. But I wanted to give this place a shot and I am glad I did.
Dhaka can be a chaotic place. This place is pretty secluded inside a protected zone. Not much traffic around and pretty close to necessary amenities (I shopped at Annona mostly where you can find almost everything).
The place is very clean. You find all the needed necessities (most importantly AC in Bangladeshi hot summer). There is laundry, microwave etc. Makes you feel like home at a North American or European city.
The people are also great. Mr. Shahid is great host. But it’s the guards (Mr. Sohel and Mr. Hashem) that made the differences! I came to the place around midnight sometimes and rang the bell and they were always SMILING to open the door for me. BANGLADESHI PEOPLE ARE REALLY HOSPITABLE.
I wish them all the best and hope to stay there again next time I am in Dhaka.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2019,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
I had a very good stay in the Cozy Studio. It had a bit of a musty smell at first but that disappeared after about a day. The room was clean and equipped with everything you could need and is well located, only a short journey from the airport and to Gulshan. It is also a safe and secure neighbourhood with a nice lake/park, and nearby gym and supermarket. Shahid welcomed me and gave me detailed information of anything I might need and was always quick to respond with any questions. Being on the ground floor the studio is probably the noisiest of the rooms available here but it didn't cause me too many problems.
Thank you

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2019,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: You will have a nice place to stay in Cozy studio in Dhaka if you stay here . Quite, peacefully, clean and safe which i could say. Strongly recommend someone travel to Dhaka and i will stay again here if i come back to Dhaka next time.
